sentences: Hansjörg Pauli (3 March 1931 in Winterthur, Switzerland – 15 February 2007) was a Swiss musicologist, writer, and music critic. He was a pupil of Hans Keller.

From 1960 to 1965 Pauli worked at Radio Zürich on new music broadcasts, and between 1965 and 1968 he was a music editor for NDR-Fernsehen where he directed TV documentaries and produced films by Richard Leacock, Rolf Liebermann, Klaus Wildenhahn and others.
